'The Action' were an English band of the 1960s. They were part of the mod
subculture, {{cite book
| first= Paul last= Du Noyer year= 2003 title= The Illustrated Encyclopedia
| of Music edition= 1st publisher= Flame Tree Publishing location= Fulham,
| London isbn= 1-904041-96-5 page= 36}} and played soul music-
| influenced pop music.
categories: British rhythm and blues boom musicians
